>
[Reptile Speaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=1054) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You hear the sounds of reptiles as language. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with animals that are reptiles (the GM determines which animals count as reptiles).
